data.Sentence_cn: 伊恩.汤普森先生最近才买的一个小酒店现在又要卖出去。
data.Sentence: A public house which was recently bought by Mr.Ian Thompson is up for sale.

data.Sentence_cn: 汤普森先生之所以想卖它，是因为那里常闹鬼。
data.Sentence: Mr.Thompson is going to sell it because it is haunted.

data.Sentence_cn: 他告诉我有天夜里他怎么也睡不着，因为他听到酒吧里传来一阵奇怪的响声。
data.Sentence: He told me that he could not go to sleep one night because he heard a strange noise coming from the bar.

data.Sentence_cn: 第二天早上，他发现酒吧间的门被椅子堵上了，家具也被挪动过。
data.Sentence: The next morning, he found that the doors had been blocked by chairs and the furniture had been moved.

data.Sentence_cn: 虽然汤普森临睡觉时把灯关了，但早晨灯却都亮着。
data.Sentence: Though Mr.Thompson had turned the lights off before he went to bed, they were on in the morning.

data.Sentence_cn: 他还说他发现了5只空的威士忌酒瓶子，这肯定是鬼魂昨天晚上喝的。
data.Sentence: He also said that he had found five empty whisky bottles which the ghost must have drunk the night before.

data.Sentence_cn: 当我暗示说一定是村里有些人来喝不花钱的酒时，汤普森先生摇了摇头。
data.Sentence: When I suggested that some villagers must have come in for a free drink, Mr.Thompson shook his head.

data.Sentence_cn: 村里的人已经告诉他，即使他把小酒店白送人，他们也不要。
data.Sentence: The villagers have told him that they will not accept the pub even if he gives it away.
